title: Ferrari F430
summary: The Ferrari F430 (Type F131) is a sports car produced by the Italian automobile manufacturer Ferrari from 2004 to 2009 as a successor to the Ferrari 360. The car is an update to the 360 with notable exterior and performance changes. It was unveiled at the 2004 Paris Motor Show.[7]  The F430 was succeeded by the 458 which was unveiled on 28 July 2009.[8]
